idea-plugin.name: Commit Checker
idea-plugin.description:
This Plugin checks files selected for commit for a specified keyword. If found it will ask for a confirmation upon commit, warning of a found keyword.
It will only alarm for newly added words, not the ones that existed also before the commit.

To specify keywords, just create a file (anywhere inside of Project) called `commit_checker.txt` and in there specify words to look out for separated by comma (line breaks don't matter)
There is also a checkbox in Commit window that allows you to enable/disable commit checker
